message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. As a starting point, I'm willing to sell it to you for $13000. This is a competitive price, considering the product's worth to you is $15000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $11500. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer you a compromise at $12800. This is still a good deal for you, considering the product's value to you is $15000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm thinking of making an offer of $12200. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
